items.content: Now you can assign tabs to vendors and product types as well as collections, tags and products!
You can easily copy tabs by clicking the ‘Duplicate’ button on a tab’s edit screen.
Liquid tags can be used in tab titles (including the Description tab) and content to give you an incredible amount of dynamic functionality.
You can preview any enabled theme by clicking ‘Preview’ in the action dropdown on the themes page.
Tabs has been meticulously coded using semantic HTML. Why does that matter? Users have reported great improvements in SEO ranking!
Our tabs are built with accessibility in mind and can be navigated easily with just a keyboard.
Tabs by Station is fast. In tests, our front end script renders tabs in less than 2 milliseconds.

items.title: News
items.content: Tabs has a new look! We've made some changes to help make the app easier to use. You can now manage all of your tabs from the new Tabs page.
